name: pnp-powerautomate-samples-ScheduledQuoteEmail
title: Scheduled Quote Email - D365
shortDescription: Schedule a weekly email send containing a list of quote rows that need follow up, including a clickable link to each quote row.
longDescription: Schedule a weekly email send containing a list of quote rows that need follow up, including a clickable link to each quote row.
